name: Roasted Flat Mushrooms with Green Onion, Thyme & Butter
description: This can be made with any large mushrooms. Roasting them underside-up allows the herb and green onion butter to seep deep in between the mushrooms gills.Covering with foil helps the mushrooms stay nice and moist, while helping the herbs and green onions retain their vibrant emerald colour. It looks so fresh and stunning against the deep brown  of the mushroom gills!Simple, easy and exceptionally delicious. Serve as a vegetarian main for 3 - 4 people, starter or side for 6 to 8, or as part of a meatless meal spread.
recipeIngredient: 8  large mushrooms ((flat, portobello, "BBQ"), around 10 - 12cm / 4 - 4.5" wide, stem tips trimmed (Note 1))
1 tbsp fresh thyme leaves ((sub 1 tsp dried))

recipeInstructions.text: Mix butter: Mix the Herb & Green Onion Butter ingredients together in a medium bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix butter: Mix the Herb & Green Onion Butter ingredients together in a medium bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Smear mushrooms: Place mushrooms gills side up on a large tray. Smear the butter mix over the mushroom surfaces. Cover with foil (preserves green colour of herbs).
recipeInstructions.name: Smear mushrooms: Place mushrooms gills side up on a large tray. Smear the butter mix over the mushroom surfaces. Cover with foil (preserves green colour of herbs).

recipeInstructions.text: Bake: Bake 25 minutes, until mushrooms are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake: Bake 25 minutes, until mushrooms are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve! Arrange on a platter, including all butter and juices on tray. Scatter with thyme stalks and extra scallions over the mushrooms (for a fresh touch), and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve! Arrange on a platter, including all butter and juices on tray. Scatter with thyme stalks and extra scallions over the mushrooms (for a fresh touch), and serve.

review.reviewBody: My family and I loved the portabella mushroom salad...with seasoned butter, chives, parsley and thyme it was a delicious appetizer!
Served as an entrée last night.  Extremely easy to prepare and very tasty!  Will make again!
Hi Nagi, always love your recipes and these were so delicious! Definitely a keeper. Thankyou for this recipe.

keywords: BBQ mushrooms, field mushroom recipe, flat mushroom recipe
